pain in her arm in the muscle where the needle was placed; pain in her arm in the muscle where the needle was placed; she almost fainted; had so much tightness in her throat; couldn't swallow; the other arm pain; 8-10 days late for her period; This is a spontaneous report from a contactable consumer (patient). A 50-year-old female patient received the first dose of BNT162B2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 VACCINE, lot number: ER8731 and expiration date not provided), via an unspecified route of administration, in arm left, on 18Apr2021 09:30 (at the age of 50-year-old), at single dose, for COVID-19 immunization. Medical history reported as no. Concomitant medications were not reported. No prior vaccinations within 4 weeks. Patient was scheduled for the second dose on 09May2021 but she had doubts because of her reaction to the first dose. The patient experienced 8-10 days late for her period in Apr2021; pain in her arm in the muscle where the needle was placed on 18Apr2021; almost fainted on 18Apr2021; had so much tightness in her throat on 18Apr2021;couldn't swallow on 18Apr2021; and the other arm pain on 18Apr2021. Patient stated this was not an allergic reaction and the vaccination provider was about to administer the epi-pen but then she did not. Patient would like to know if her side effects are normal and if she should receive the second dose. Patient got the first shot on 18Apr2021 and she was scared of needles so she just didn't look at them but this one... Patient stated as soon as she got the shot, she had pain in her arm in the muscle where the needle was placed. Patient stated it's not a big deal. Patient stated the pharmacy said it's ok to feel pain and told caller to go sit down and they would be with her in half an hour or so. Patient stated she didn't even make it through the door, she almost fainted and could not hear what she was saying, she had so much tightness in her throat and she couldn't swallow. Patient stated it lasted about 2 to 3 minutes (also reported "lasted for 3-4 minutes"). Patient stated they called an ambulance but it took them 15 minutes to get there and she felt better by then. Patient stated because they told her to wait and she couldn't even get through the door so she just laid on the floor and her throat got so tight, she was frightened. Patient stated it lasted about 5 minutes, actually. Patient confirmed her symptoms began and ended on 18Apr2021. As for "hurting in her muscle; arm pain", patient stated she had the arm pain for two days but then her whole arm started hurting in that arm, but that was a different pain. Patient stated she got the shot at 09:30 in the morning and by 16:00 afternoon she started feeling the pain. Patient stated the pain from the needle when she got the shot, that pain lasted 5 to 6 hours or maybe she would say less. Patient stated after 16:00, then the other arm pain started. Patient stated she was putting ice on and off it for arm soreness overnight and into the next day. Patient confirmed her arm pain ended 19Apr2021. Patient confirmed she had recovered completely from all symptoms. Patient stated she didn't have any pains or anything so she would think she has recovered. Patient stated she went to her physician and the doctor suggested that she should take the second shot. Patient stated she also was 8-10 days late for her period. Patient stated something happened and she said she couldn't do it because she was going to get her period and then it didn't come and days passed by. Patient stated she was supposed to get it 21Apr2021 or 22Apr2021, supposed to get it between 21Apr2021 and 25Apr2021 and she got it yesterday, 04May2021. Patient stated as soon as it passed 26Apr2021, but she was also 51 and menopausal so it might be that, but she doubts it. No emergency room or physician office require for events. Treatment received for event "the other arm pain" included putting ice on and off. The outcome of the event "8-10 days late for her period" was recovered on 04May2021; of "pain in her arm in the muscle where the needle was placed/ almost fainted/ had so much tightness in her throat/ couldn't swallow" was recovered on 18Apr2021, of "arm pain" was recovered on 19Apr2021. No follow-up attempts are possible. No further information is expected.

Close
Right inner ear whooshing coinciding with heartbeat began 6d post 1st Covid shot (had on April 15, 2021). Persistent and constant. Coupled with extremely high blood pressure; atypical for patient. Ear whooshing went away 2 weeks after 2nd Covid shot. Intermittently returning 3+ weeks after 2nd Covid shot. Three days post 2nd shot (May 9th), awoken at night with repeated intense 'adrenaline' rushes/panic attack like feelings, which prevented sleep. The events seemed to occur at the moment the patient was about to fall asleep, then would jolt patient up. These INTENSE events continued for 4.5 hours. Patient tried deep breathing exercises to no avail. Patient eventually rose from bed and did multiple 'full body shakes' to try and relax. Finally was able to sleep. Patient experienced 2nd menstrual cycle in one month. Atypical for this person, who had never had any anomalous or difficult cycles in her life. May 29. This night again experienced same adrenaline rush/panic symptoms overnight, again wholly preventing sleep. Patient took ibuprofen to relax muscles, to no effect. Patient again tried full body shakeout 2x. After 2nd time, was able to sleep after 4-5h of insomnia--complete inability to fall asleep.

None of the additional vaccines administered on same date of the Pfizer suspect. The patient received no other vaccination with 4 weeks of COVID vaccination. On an unspecified date in Apr2021, the patient was experiencing joint pain throughout her body, was worse right after the vaccine but has gotten better but still experiencing pain, was wondering if this was a side effect of the vaccine. States she has already spoken with the safety department. On 15Apr2021, the patient's top left ear was in pain: Her ear was hurting on the same side she received the covid vaccine, her left side. Clarifies that her ear only hurt at the top, her cartilage part was what hurt. It was really odd, and very weird. It lasted for 4 or 5 days. On 15Apr2021, the patient's ear felt like it was burning and hurt painful. On an unspecified date in Apr2021, the patient was noticed a lymph node on the side of her neck on the same side she received the covid vaccine. On an unspecified date in Apr2021, every single point of her body hurt, every knuckle, finger and toe and it lasted about two weeks where it was very painful, but the patient still had it now. It began 2 or 3 days after she received the second dose of the covid vaccine. Now it has subsisted into feeling like a dull joint pain. Every point of her joints was weird, even padding of her feet hurt. Before her pain was a sharp joint pain. On an unknown date in 2021, the patient's having normal menstrual cycle till then but since receiving the vaccine she has not had one. She had spoked with her OB/GYN (obstetrics and gynaecology) and was advised to report to Pfizer, to which caller states she had already spoked with the safety department. The patient did not undergo any laboratory test. Event having normal menstrual cycle till then but since receiving the vaccine she has not had one resulted in Physician Office Visit. The outcome of the events Joint pain throughout her body, a lymph node on the side of her neck and every single point of her body hurt, every knuckle, finger and toe was resolving, top left ear was in pain and her ear felt like it was burning was resolved in Apr2021 and having normal menstrual cycle till then but since receiving the vaccine she has not had one was unknown. Followup attempts are possible, additional information has been requested.

Wednesday, May 19, 2021 1st COVID-19 vaccination shot Summary: Wednesday, May 19, 2021 received my 1st COVID-19 vaccination shot. My body tried to reject it. I threw up 5 times. Ensued many unwanted side effects. I don?t think it would be good to get the 2nd vaccine dose. Given I am not fully vaccinated, I need an alternative solution to prevent being infected with the virus. Help!!!! Please Help!!! Bad Side Effects: Stuffy Nose Congested Nose Headaches Vomiting Nauseous Upset Stomach Unsettled Stomach Unusual Perspiration Pain in Left Arm Abnormal Period Menstrual Blood Clots Shoulder Pain/Tension Upper Back Pain/Tension Chest Pain/Tension Shooting Pain in Chest Heart Palpitations? Numbness Runny Nose Sneezing Profusely Allergies? Hoarse Voice Winded Dry Mouth Existing Worsened: Cold Sores Stomach Noises Snoring? Foot Numbness Ear Ringing Eye Floaters Joints Popping Sound Other Observations: Stomach Bloated Increased Flatulence Pseudo Conclusion: Given my body?s adverse reaction I don?t think it is wise to get the 2nd shot. It is obvious my body does not like it. I am disappointed because I really did not plan to get vaccinated; however, I felt I had no other option when the government made the announcement. When the government announced No masks for those vaccinated, I know there would be some NOT vaccinated & NOT wearing a mask thus putting me at risk. I am okay with wearing a mask for another year or even for the next 5 years. The doctors have said me wearing a mask is protecting others not necessarily myself. I concluded even if I continue to wear a mask there would be others (NO mask & NOT vaccinated) not following the rules potentially exposing me to the virus. Hence the only way to protect myself is to get vaccinated. The vaccine appears to have affected so many areas of my body. I regret getting the 1st shot, I want to remove every trace of it from my anatomy. Please let me know if it is possible to rid the vaccine along with all the bad side effects from my body. I do not want to subject my body to anymore of this vaccine; however, I still need a reliable solution to avoid being infected with the virus. I don?t know what to do. Details: Wednesday, May 19, 2021, I received my 1st COVID-19 vaccination shot around 3:30pm. The medical staff had all those being vaccinated to sit for at least 15 minutes for observation to be monitored. I stayed for monitoring for close to an hour (wearing my masks). I felt fine, I noticed my right nostril felt stuffy, congested with a slight burn sensation. I noticed a slight headache when I left. I had about 3 errands to do. 2 hours later I wasn?t feeling well. In addition to a stronger headache my stomach felt queasy. Around 6:30pm I had to pullover to vomit; I threw off my mask and threw up once and then a 2nd time. I sat in my car taking deep breaths until I felt I could make it home. I make it home around 7pm in time to throw up 3 more times, for a total of 5 times. The vomit tasted acidic, sour, citrusy, and metallic at times, and salty. I was only throwing up the vaccine it was mostly clear with white alka seltzer looking deposits. I last ate some crackers around 12 noon. Vomiting is NOT normal for me. I can?t remember the last time I threw up, many many many years ago. l had a headache, queazy stomach, and was exhausted; about 7:30pm tried to sleep. I got up around 10:30pm ate a few saltines and drank a little water but I still didn?t feel good so I didn?t eat anything else. Rough night trying to sleep, tossing and turning. Next day (Thursday day 2) I felt slightly better, not comfortable enough for real food so I drank plenty of water in small amounts and ate saltines; headache subsided. I also had more than usual underarm perspiration with a strong unfamiliar odor. Wednesday, May 19, 2021 1st COVID-19 vaccination shot It appears the vaccine affected my menstrual cycle. My period usually lasts for 3-5 days max, usually light blood flow on days 4 and 5. It was a normal light day 5 when I received the vaccine. After the vaccine, I began having heavy blood flow. The heavy blood flow is accompanied by blood clots. In the past I?ve had a blood clot here and there but not like this. Menstrual blood clots for 9 days after being vaccinated. This is NOT normal for my body. My period was 14 days. Prior to being vaccinated, I NEVER had a period last this long. To my surprise the vaccine affected my female organs. I am right handed, so the nurse recommended using my left arm for vaccination. Left arm where vaccine injected was very sore. Arm pain subsided after 3 days. Pain soreness tension primarily on my left side, shoulder, upper back, chest area. There is a shooting pain on left shoulder, down back to breast, chest heart area; pain comes and goes. Heart palpitations? Experienced this for over a week about 10 days. Numbness in left hand when I sleep on my left side, wake with my left hand numb. Numbness in both hands when I try to sleep on my back. Numbness in my feet after standing for about 15 minutes. Numbness in my leg and buttocks, primarily left side after sitting for an extended period of time. Before being vaccinated I only experienced numbness in my right foot after being on my feet for an extended period of over 4 hours. Last year my right foot/heel would began to hurt after being on my feet for an extended period of time (> 4 hours). Then there would be pins and needles sensation. The solution would be to rest and elevate my feet. I also replaced my shoes (proper support). Post vaccination even before the time my feet would hurt now my right foot goes numb within 30 minutes of standing even while wearing supportive shoes. My left butt cheek goes numb when I am sitting with my legs elevated; this was my most comfortable position pre-vaccination. Since the vaccine my stomach feels upset or unsettled especially in the morning. I am also noticing bloating and more gas than usual. My stomach is also excessively more noisy. Before the vaccine my stomach would make noises when I was hungry or hadn?t eaten, but now there are so many stomach noises almost nonstop all day and night long all the time My nose is feeling congested with a slight burn sensation since getting the vaccination. Immediately after getting the shot my right nostril felt stuffy, congested with a slight burn sensation. This congested feeling comes and goes, especially noticeable when wearing a mask. Prior to being vaccinated I had not experience this issue even as I have worn multiple masks for over a year with NO stuffy nose. Saturday, May 29, 2021 (day 10 post vaccination) I get cold symptoms; runny nose and sneezing. I haven?t had a cold in years; I don?t really get colds; if so the symptoms are mild and quickly dissipate. Now my nose has been running pretty much non-stop causing me to blow my nose just as often. I am also sneezing a lot. This is NOT normal for me. I drank plenty of liquids; however, running nose and sneezing continued leading to hoarse voice. These symptoms prevented me from sleeping. I don?t know if these are cold or allergy symptoms. I had NO allergies before the vaccine. These symptoms finally subsided after 3 or 4 days. My neighbors are waking up in the middle of the night (2am, 3am, 4am, 5am). I began to wonder if I am waking my neighbors possibly with snoring. I don?t really know, no evidence. Throat feels winded and dry when talking especially when I try to whisper. I have to drink a lot of water. Ringing in my ear started In 2019. I thought this phantom sound went away; however, post vaccination I?m hearing the ringing sound again. It seems worse than before. 2018 diagnosed with eye floaters. I am noticing floaters more since getting the vaccine. I usually see the eye floaters when going to light from dark. Post vaccination I am noticing the floaters even in dim light; not normal. I started getting Cold sores in 2006. I thought I had them somewhat under control. Since the vaccine l keep getting cold sores, this may be due to my menstruation. Recently within the past year, my shoulder and elbow joints sometimes make this popping sound when I exercise/move my arm. Post vaccination my shoulders and elbows are making the popping sound every time I move my arm. Now sometimes my knees and ankles are also making a popping .

Medical history included asthma and thyroid from an unknown date and unknown if ongoing. The patient was taking other medications in two weeks. The patient previously took Vitamin B12 (reported as B12) and experienced drug allergy. The patient was previously vaccinated with BNT162B2 (Batch/Lot Number: ENG201) in the left arm on 09Feb2021 03:15 PM as first dose, single dose for COVID-19 immunisation. Patient was also previously vaccinated with Tetanus vaccine in the left arm on 20Jan2021 as first dose for tetanus immunization and experienced Shingles. The patient was not pregnant at the time of vaccination. No other vaccine was received by the patient in four weeks. The patient had no COVID prior vaccination and was not tested for COVID post vaccination. On 10Mar2021, the patient experienced irregular vaginal bleeding and nausea. No treatment was given as a result of the events. The outcome of the event was not recovered No follow-up attempts are possible. No further information is expected.

Close
My period has been lasting all the way up to now since the first shot on May 28, when I was in my period for 1 week or so. At this point, my period has been almost 4 weeks long and will continue going on as I can see since the bleeding amount has drastically increased and become heavy 2 days after the 2nd shot administered on June 21. I went to my medical care provider on May 25, and reported this problem. And the provider ordered lab test, i.e. CBC and Prothrombin Time, for the the results have not come out yet. (continued in the section below). The provider also referred me to the department of Obstetrics and Gynecology, for which I am waiting for their call. The following information is provided here in an hope to bring to your attention, which reveals that many women has experienced/been experiencing the similar problem as I do subsequent to be vaccinated: Tweet from Dr. regarding the abnormal period subsequent to got vaccinated. And many women replied to her tweet telling their own experience in this regard.

I still had air, but was concerned for the noticeable tightness of throat which continued for hours. This was better the next day, but since then, I have not stopped ?spotting? in an irregular menstrual spotting and has not ceased. Yesterday however, 7/7/21, I was too tired to keep my eyes open in the afternoon, laid down for a power nap, and there was a noticeable irregular heartbeat twice, in which I was awoken from my nap twice due to what seemed to my heart not beating normally, my chest seemed heavy, and both times after waking from a nap and noticing, I noticed my left arm in the vein area slightly uncomfortable. I have also had to take ibuprofen for a headache yesterday and on one other occasion , and yesterday my lymph in my throat were swollen slightly again- and neither of these symptoms are normal for my own body . I did not get the 2nd dose yet , but due to tightness of throat, I don?t plan to either. I just feel like I should say something.

51 2021-01-24 heavy menstrual bleeding I received dose 2 on tuesday 1pm, after 12 hours the fever kicked in and lasted 24 hours through lat... Read more
Close
I received dose 2 on tuesday 1pm, after 12 hours the fever kicked in and lasted 24 hours through late wednesday night rendering me fairly useless. But that's not the event I'm reporting. On saturday, my period started, and it's literally the heaviest period that I've ever had in my life (and it's still going). I'm perimenopausal, and haven't had a period in 5 months, so at first I chalked it up to that, but the timing is suspicious so I asked around - there seems to be a lot of women who have been having off-schedule, very-heavy periods after their vaccinations. I'm a research scientist and I think this is worth investigating to see if it's truly a vaccine effect and what the implications are, especially knowing that covid affects clotting. I've also submitted this info on pfizer's site.

Patient received dose #1 of COVID-19 vaccine on 1/16/21. Within 3 days, she developed petechiae up to ankles, later rising up to her knees. Pt admitted to hospital on 2/6/21 for symptomatic anemia 2/2 vaginal bleeding. Patient received 4 units FFP, 4 units PRBC, 1 unit cryoprecipitate, and vitamin K 5 mg IV. Also started on medroxyprogesterone 20 mg PO TID. Alectinib d/ced due to worsening liver function. Evalauted by OB/GYN and Hematology. Diagnosed with DIC. Patient with worsening bilateral lower extremity edema and purpura with pain and weakness. Palliative care consulted. Patient passed away on 2/11.

heavy bleeding with lots of blood clots; extended and heavy menstrual period/ heavy bleeding with lots of blood clots; This is a spontaneous report from a contactable consumer (patient). A 51-year-old non-pregnant female patient received second dose of BNT162B2 (Pfizer product), lot no. EN5318, via an unspecified route of administration (left arm) on 19Feb2021 at a single dose for COVID-19 immunisation at a workplace clinic. Medical history included high cholesterol and anxiety. No known allergies. No COVID prior to vaccination. Concomitant medications were not reported. Historical vaccine included first dose of BNT162B2 (brand: Pfizer, lot no. EL9261, left arm) for COVID-19 immunisation on 30Jan2021 at age of 50 years old. No other vaccine in four weeks. The patient was experiencing extended and heavy menstrual period. Her cycle began on 05Mar2021 and was still happening as of today 16Mar2021. She had heavy bleeding with lots of blood clots. This was not normal for her at all. She is calling her doctor tomorrow. No treatment received for the events. No COVID test post vaccination. The outcome of the events was not recovered.

Close
headache; arm started aching; The lymph nodes in her arm are still swollen; Swelling in the armpits (for about 7 days) that got very itchy for 3-4 days but has since disappeared/severe itching and swelling in her arm pits/lymph nodes in her arm are still swollen/It is both armpits; Swelling in the armpits (for about 7 days) that got very itchy for 3-4 days but has since disappeared/severe itching and swelling in her arm pits/lymph nodes in her arm are still swollen/It is both armpits; itching on both of her feet; red circle where she got the injection. It was the size of a dime and only there on 28Jan2021; arm that she got the vaccine in got very large; Swelling in the upper breast area/swelling in her upper chest; Swelling and pain in the neck/Neck pain; Swelling and pain in the neck/Neck pain; This is a spontaneous report from a contactable consumer. A 51-years-old female patient received bnt162b2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 VACCINE, Solution for injection), dose 1 via an unspecified route of administration, administered in Arm Left on 27Jan2021 15:00 as single dose for covid-19 immunization.Medical history included menopause or has been through menopause, Flu shot, hormonal issues, she started with a bizarre virus, whole lymph node response; It was lymph nodes in her neck, arm pits, and groin. Every two days she would have lymph nodes reacting, she had a little infection and inflammatory markers come back positive. Concomitant medication included probiotics, vitamin c [ascorbic acid] (VITAMIN C [ASCORBIC ACID]) and vitamin d [vitamin d nos] (VITAMIN D [VITAMIN D NOS]). The patient previously took flu for influenza immunisation and experienced peripheral swelling, tetanus vaccine for immunisation, amoxicillin, and experienced drug hypersensitivity, flagyl [metronidazole] and experienced drug hypersensitivity. The patient reported adverse events associated with her first Pfizer COVID vaccine shot. She experienced swelling in the upper breast area, swelling and pain in the neck, swelling in the armpits (for about 7 days) that got very itchy for 3-4 days but has since disappeared. She thought on whether to get the second shot of the vaccine considering these side effects since her doctor did not know why this was happening according to her. She thought she would report some side effects after one shot of the Pfizer COVID19 Vaccine. It was strange. She did not read the symptoms until seven days out. Then she saw some have reported a lot less. After the shot, that night she had swelling in her upper chest. She thought it was lymph nodes in the breast and chest area on the side she got the shot. The next day her arm that she got the vaccine in got very large. Then, she does not know if it was related, two days later she had itching on both of her feet. It was the tops of her feet and only for a couple of days. She is not counting that. Day five after the shot has been the main problem. Her armpits started itching like crazy. It was severe itching and swelling in her armpits. The itching lasted for three to four days. The lymph nodes in her arm are still swollen. It was five days after the shot. It was both armpits. The night of the shot she had a lot of neck pain and she thought it was probably the lymph nodes in the back of her neck. That has lasted and was slowly diminishing. The patient was not planning on getting it. There was an agency that for assisted living for people that need help. They were giving it and had extra doses. This guy in charge at the assisted living house offered it to caller and caller's husband because her and her husband run a behavior health counseling. He offered it to them as healthcare professionals. He was given a batch for the residential agency but had extras. She was going through menopause or has been through menopause. She has hot flashes and has hormonal issues. The first week of December she started with a bizarre virus. She got tested for COVID and it was negative. It was not a rapid test it was a sendoff. Through that illness she had a whole lymph node response which was super unusual. The doctor said it was really strange. It was lymph nodes in her neck, arm pits, and groin. Every two days she would have lymph nodes reacting. She had recovered from that and was back to normal. Four days before she got the shot all of that had resolved. Prior to getting the vaccine she had been tested for Lymphoma and it was negative, and she had a little infection, and her white blood count was normal. She had inflammatory markers come back positive prior to getting the vaccine. She went to the doctor on 27Jan2021 and asked if she should get the shot. The doctor said to do it because if she got COVID it would be worse. She was going to have a follow up with doctor for the ongoing stuff and he might do more test. Never in the course of any of that did she have itching armpits or swelling that lasted all this time. She never had chest swelling. The shot in the arm and it moved across her chest. It was reported that, back in the 90's, in 1993 or 1994, flu shots caused her arm to swell really large and stayed swollen for three months. That was the last three flu shots she got in the 90's. Then the doctor said not to get them. No one said why. She doesn't have allergy to eggs or anything that she knows to cause that. She has gotten all other vaccines and tetanus within the last 10 years. Her arm would kind of react but not like that. It went away in a reasonable amount of time. She didn't get a fever. The patient does not have NDC, lot and expiry for flu shots, other vaccines or tetanus to provide. When her kids were younger, they all had to be vaccinated for rabies. She did not have any reaction at all with those vaccines. She has allergies to antibiotics. She does not have lot numbers, NDC, or expiry for the antibiotics she was allergic to. She was allergic to Amoxicillin, Flagyl, Doxycycline, and Sulfa drugs. She has allergies to adhesive and contrast dye. No food allergies. She has allergies to dog and other environmental allergies. She does not take any medications for any of that. She has never had any anaphylactic shock of any kind. It has always been hives. The patient experienced swelling in the upper breast area/swelling in her upper chest, swelling and pain in the neck/neck pain, swelling and pain in the neck/neck pain, swelling in the armpits (for about 7 days) that got very itchy for 3-4 days but has since disappeared/severe itching and swelling in her arm pits/lymph nodes in her arm are still swollen/it is both armpits, arm that she got the vaccine in got very large, itching on both of her feet, red circle where she got the injection. It was the size of a dime and only there on 28jan2021, headache, arm started aching and the lymph nodes in her arm are still swollen. Outcome of the events Swelling in the upper breast area/swelling in her upper chest and arm that she got the vaccine in got very large was recovering, outcome of the events Swelling and pain in the neck/Neck pain, Swelling in the armpits (for about 7 days) that got very itchy for 3-4 days but has since disappeared/severe itching and swelling in her arm pits/lymph nodes in her arm are still swollen/It is both armpits, itching on both of her feet and red circle where she got the injection. It was the size of a dime and only there on 28Jan2021 was recovered and outcome unknown for other events. Information on the lot/batch number has been requested.

51 2021-04-13 menstrual disorder I submitted a report after my first dose of the vaccine , and now this is the report after my 2nd do... Read more
Close
I submitted a report after my first dose of the vaccine , and now this is the report after my 2nd dose of the Pfizer vaccine: I got the 2nd dose at 4:10pm. I did not feel the shot at all this time, but my arm was a bit achy soon after. One hour after the shot my leg muscles hurt and I felt fatigued. Two hours after the shot I felt really tired and really silly, kind of loopy. Three hours after the shot my L arm was hurting more and it hurt to take the band aid off. Then my stomach started feeling upset. I went to bed at 10:30pm and had a very rough sick night. I was awake most of the night, only dozing a few times. I had a fever (101) and chills; nausea and belching; dry mouth; aching and strange pains coming and going; a slight headache; and my L arm was hurting. By 7am I started crying, and I had more physical pain. I got up at 8am feeling so sick with extreme fatigue, headache, and in a lot of pain in body. My Mom had to make my breakfast for me and I took small bites of that oatmeal throughout the day. I couldn't eat very much because my stomach was so upset. I felt hot and cold and got chills often during the day. By 6:45pm the fever returned (100.3) and I felt sicker again with head and tummy hurting; body aching; and nausea. Finally at 8pm I took 2 Tylenol which helped a lot, but then I worried what if that reduced the effectiveness of the vaccine. I went to bed at 9:15pm and fell asleep right away, but woke up many times soaking wet with sweat. The next day I still had trouble with temperature regulation and I felt very tired and headachy and my L arm still hurt. A few days later I got my menstrual cycle about one week early, and it was the strangest period I've ever had. It was a very light flow, I had lots of clots, and along with the small amount of blood, there was lots of clear stretchy mucous like I get at ovulation. After my first vaccine dose I got my period a few days later also, but that time I only had brown spotting for 4 days and no regular blood flow at all, so this time it was slightly more of a period, but it was really not my usual kind of period. Overall, I felt completely whacked and wrecked by the 2nd dose. It was a terrible experience.

Close
About 5 days after initial vaccine I began a period that was the heaviest I had ever had. After 10 days I contacted my Dr. who ordered blood work. Did blood work on 4/5, by this time period had finally slowed to spotting. Had 2nd vaccine on 4/6 and immediately started bleeding heavily again and about 4 days in had four or five clots the size of half dollars or larger. Saw Dr. on 4/14 and ordered another blood test and was prescribed iron pills for anemia. As of the date 4/20, I am still bleeding with no signs of stopping.

This 51-year-old (non-pregnant) female patient received the first dose of BNT162b2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 mRNA VACCINE; Lot Number: ER8727), via an unspecified route of administration in the right arm on 08Apr2021 11:30 (at the age of 51-year-old) as a single dose for COVID-19 immunization. The patient's concomitant medications were only women multi-vitamins. Prior to the vaccination, the patient was diagnosed with COVID-19. Since 26Apr2021, she has been bleeding heavily with small clots. All day today (on 28Apr2021) she has been bleeding very very heavy with clots. She was planning to go to her doctor by morning, but she was following through with her second dose tomorrow (29Apr2021). The clinical outcome of the events "have not had menstrual cycle since 2018; started spotting; bleeding heavily with small clots" were not resolved. Medical history included perimenopause in which the patient was having longer durations between periods but relatively normal (for her) in length of four to five days, environmental allergies and a heavy menstrual bleeding in which was described as one period about 14 months prior that was longer and heavier than she typically experienced however it only lasted for just over a week with slightly heavier discharge with some clumps; all of which from an unknown date and unknown if ongoing. Patient was not pregnant. No other vaccine was given in four weeks. Patient was not COVID positive prior vaccination and was not tested for COVID post vaccination. On 09Feb2021, the patient experienced extremely heavy flow period that lasted 20 days. It was reported that the patient started her period approximately 48 hours before receiving the second dose of the vaccine and her flow was pretty typical until a couple days after her shot at which time she developed a much heavier flow with large, thick, dark clumps of bloody discharge. The patient also experienced mild cramping usually occurring in the late morning nearly every day resulting in heavier discharge, slightly tired, sore arm and achy joints on 09Feb2021. It was also reported that since the patient has history of heavy menstrual bleeding, she was not initially alarmed by the heavier flow. The patient began to have some concern as the period wore on but felt normal in every other way. No treatment was given for the events. The outcome of the events was recovered.

The concomitant medications were not reported. Patient is the only girl in the house and she noticed after her first dose she skipped her period that month (Apr2021), her period did not come, which does not happen to her. She skipped it sometime in early April, clarifies she should have had her period on 01Apr2021. After 29Apr2021 she got it 16 days later and now she is waiting for her next period. She did not know if her next period would be normal or not. She did not know if her body was readjusting. She did not think anything of it until she started hearing things here and there about vaccines affecting periods and vaccine shedding. On 23Mar2021, patient experienced soreness in her arm which was hurting. On 24Mar2021, she was also very tired and had joint aches/body aches. Around 11 days after first vaccine (on 03Apr2021) she had stomach issues, like diarrhea for 4 days or something. She did not eat anything weird or unusual. No one else had it so it could not be a virus. She mentioned it to them and asked could it be a side effect of the vaccine and they said sure, it could be. The adverse events did not result in the emergency room visit of physician office visit. The outcome of the event skipped period was unknown, of the event stomach issues/diarrhea was resolved on 07Apr2021, while for other events was resolved on an unspecified date in Mar 2021 (reported as 25Mar2021 or 26Mar2021). No follow-up attempts possible. No further information expected.

Diarrhea for the next couple days. 5/11/21 approximately 3 am pain in lower abdomen, but subsided after a few hours. Diarrhea for a few days. 5/21/21 2nd shot. That same night some menstrual bleeding and spotted next 4 days. I have not had a period since I went off the pill on 11/27/20. My FSH test shows I'm in menopause. 6/6/21 - menstrual bleeding again. 6/21 & 6/22 spotting again. 7/2/21 sever cramping in the middle of the night again. 7/5/21 menstrual bleeding. Ended on 7/9/21. I have never in my life had cramping like this and haven't had a period this "heavy" in about 7 or 8 years.

1. Migraines began 3 days after the second dose. I have had 1-2 migraines since my vaccination one month ago. (Treatment was sleep and Advil). 2. I had spotting (slight menstruation 10 days after the vaccine). I have been through menopause and not had a period for well over 4 years. 3. I am very lethargic. I start my day with exercise and energy, but I have to come home and sleep...as in, take a serious nap around 4-5 days per week. This is very uncharacteristic! 4. My ears are ringing terribly! I'm accustomed to my slight tinnitus. But, on Monday, July 12th, they are ringing exceptionally loud.

Close
I had no side effects after my vaccine on 12/24/20 until 1/8/21. On Friday, 1/8/21 at 830pm I began with severe abdominal pain, low grade fever, nausea and loss of appetite. My abdominal pain persisted and worsened over the next 24-36hours. I presented to the ER on Sunday, January 10, 2021 at 8am with severe right lower quadrant pain, pelvic pain, nausea and low grade fever. I was promptly diagnosed with appendicitis and taken to the OR at approximately 2pm on the same day. In the OR my appendix was gangrenous, there was pus in the pelvic area nd fluid in my peritoneum. My appendix was not ruptured. My appendix was removed as well as part of the omentum. I remained in the hospital on IV Metronidazole and Ciprofloxacin for 2 days and was discharged on 1/13/21 at 9pm. I am continuing to recvoer at home on the same 2 antibiotics in oral form. I have a JP drain that is still in place. Of note I had two negative COVID 19 tests on 1/9/21 and 1/10/21. Both were PCR tests.

We don?t know that this was caused by the vaccine, but the symptoms came on approximately 48 hours after and it?s very unusual to get mastitis when not nursing. I?ve been on 3 different antibiotics and am still not well.

52 2021-04-12 breast swelling Within 15-20 minutes of receiving vaccine, I felt something in my chest. A slight pain or pang for a... Read more
Close
Within 15-20 minutes of receiving vaccine, I felt something in my chest. A slight pain or pang for a few seconds then it went away. The next day, I had noticeable visible swelling of my left breast and lymph nodes under my left armpit even though injection was on rt arm. This was checked out by radiologist with a mammogram/ultrasound and lefts side looked fine, right side was suspicious of a legion which was biopsies and turned out to be fibrosis. Don?t know if there?s a connection to vaccine or not. What was equally if not more concerning were the chest pains which returned a few more times getting stronger that first week after the vaccine. It was a pulling sensation on the left side of my chest that, if 10x stronger, would feel (or be?) a heart attack. And that was after the 1st dose, so I am extremely hesitant to take the 2nd dose should those particular side effects intensify. I have googled it and can find no information about chest pains after the vaccine. On a side note, my first cousin went into cardiac arrest after receiving his vaccination. He was dead and they brought him back. I?d like to avoid this.

Close
I started my period three days after I got vaccinated. I do have a heavy period because of uterine fibroids but this time it was even heavier than usual. Every hour, I had to change a blood-soaked overnight pad during the first night. After one night and a day of bleeding, on the second night, I had a near faint experience and I collapsed on the bathroom floor with nausea, cold sweating, hands numbing, short of breath. My husband called an ambulance and I was transported to ER. ER gave me fluid and did a blood check and gave me a medicine to reduce bleeding. I was discharged a few hours later. I am still bleeding but the amount is less. I have never experienced this severe period till I experience near faint.

Close
Vaginal bleeding--got what appears to be my period although I stopped menstruating a year ago.; This is a spontaneous report from a Pfizer-sponsored program Corporate (Pfizer) Social Media Platforms from a contactable consumer, the patient. A 52-years-old non-pregnant female patient received bnt162b2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 VACCINE), dose 2 via an unspecified route of administration, administered in the left arm on 21Mar2021 at 14:00 (Lot Number: ER8732) as single dose for COVID-19 immunisation. Medical history included psoriasis of scalp from an unknown date and unknown if ongoing. The patient had no known allergies. Prior to the vaccination, the patient was not diagnosed with COVID-19. Concomitant medications included adalimumab (HUMIRA), loratadine, and omeprazole (OMEPRAZOL); all from unknown dates, for unspecified indications. The patient previously received bnt162b2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 VACCINE), dose 1 via an unspecified route of administration, administered in the left arm on 27Feb2021 at 14:00 (Lot Number: EN6198), (at the age of 52 years old), as single dose for COVID-19 immunisation. On 29Mar2021 at 15:00 the patient experienced vaginal bleeding, the patient got what appears to be her period although she stopped menstruating a year ago. The patient stated they had both doses and no negative reaction, but the patient inquired if it's just coincidence or if there is a connection with getting your period suddenly start again after its stopped (patient had not had a period in about a year), since the patient did about a week after the second dose. The patient did not receive any treatment for the event. The clinical outcome of the postmenopausal bleeding was recovering. It was also reported that since the vaccination, the patient had not been tested for COVID-19.

52 2021-07-08 vaginal haemorrhage 05/18/2021 around 2AM I woke up in the middle of the night with severe chills and I took my temperat... Read more
Close
05/18/2021 around 2AM I woke up in the middle of the night with severe chills and I took my temperature and it was 100.8 degrees. For me, I'm usually at 97.2 degrees. Everything in my body hurt. I stayed home from work the next day and the fever didn't break. I never got sweaty but it just didn't break. I treated it with either ibuprofen or Tylenol. It eventually went away and I was fine. A week later on 05/25/2021 the same thing happened where I woke up in middle of night shaking and a fever of 101.3 degrees. Every part of my body hurt, behind my eyeballs hurt. I called my doctor and because I had a fever and she said I couldn't come into the office. My heart was fluttering as well and she said just go to the ER and get checked out and have them do a COVID test even though I'm fully vaccinated. I went to hospital and they did a rapid PCR COVID test which came back negative but my blood work, liver was off, proteins were off. The doctor did not come anywhere near me and told me I had UTI, gave me antibiotic, and sent me home. I've had UTI's before and I know what they feel like and this didn't feel like that. The next day 05/26/2021 I did a video visit with my doctor and I still didn't feel right. The fever part of it broke but she said that since I was still having the weird heart thing just go straight to ER so I said ok. The next morning my heart was fluttering so I went to the ER again but I went to a different hospital ER. They did blood work, EKG, Epstein-Barr, but no COVID test this time. My doctor had said to me that I really sound like I had COVID regardless of negative test. Again, the liver function was high, they did hepatitis ABC that all came back negative. Epstein-Barr came back high but not hugely high. They just said they didn't know what was wrong with me. They said it might be hepatitis or Epstein-Barr but I didn't have symptoms of mono. I did have tiny cough sometimes. They did a chest x-ray on me and didn't find anything mysterious. Over next few days they kept re-running blood and liver function test and it was still off for another 2 weeks. They sent me to cardiology because of shortness of breath and chest pain along with palpitations. He ordered more blood work and a stress echo. This past Tuesday 07/06/2021 he did angiogram thinking he would find blockages but he found nothing. He said my heart looked good but no explanation. I have never had heart palpitations before in my life. By 06/24/2021 my liver enzymes were back to normal but they're still not sure what is going on with my heart but from what he told me I don't have any blockages and my heart looks fine. My next appointment with cardiology is on 07/22 or 07/23. I was also having some vaginal bleeding and I was at the time 7 months into menopause. I went to Gynecology and they found polyps and I am going into have procedure to have polyps removed.

53 2021-04-05 menstrual cramps, vaginal haemorrhage, heavy menstrual bleeding I received the first covid vaccine on 1/4/21 and the 2nd on 1/25/21. On Feb 22nd I started having h... Read more
Close
I received the first covid vaccine on 1/4/21 and the 2nd on 1/25/21. On Feb 22nd I started having heavy vaginal bleeding and severe stomach cramps. These continued for 9 days and then I went to the Emergency department because I felt like my HGB was low. They checked it and it was 11.3 and did an abd US that showed my endometrium was thick. They recommended follow up with GYN and a biopsy. I continued to have significant bleeding and cramps until the next week when I called the nurse line and they set me up with a virtual visit with GYN provider. She started me on progesterone and scheduled a hysteroscopy and D & C for the following week. The progesterone slowed the bleeding down but I continued to experience abd cramps. I had the D & C and after getting home started to have heavy bleeding and bad cramps again. The following week I called the GYN provider and she had me come in for another Abd US and checked my HGB which was 9.3. She also checked for infection and other labs which were all within nml range. The pathology from my D & C was neg and the GYN really was not worried that is was anything other than a period but was surprised that it was lasting so long. She gave me TXA and after 5 days on that the bleeding has now stopped but I am still having bad cramps in my lower abd and a lot of bloating. Also having lots of jolting pains in lower abd. I have never had periods that were anything like this and never really had bad cramps like this before.

I typically never got cramps and have been experiencing mild cramps throughout the day. I have not been ill in any other way. I do feel that the vaccine caused this and the reason I am reporting this information.

53 2021-04-19 menstrual disorder, heavy menstrual bleeding About 39/40 hours after shot, I developed all the pre-menstrual symptoms that I would get in my teen... Read more
Close
About 39/40 hours after shot, I developed all the pre-menstrual symptoms that I would get in my teens and twenties (bad cramps in front and back; big (half of my nose big), painful cyst/zit on face; grumpy mood; blah energy), and then 1-2 hours later I started a period like I would get in my teens and twenties (very heavy and very red). Still going after 5 days though finally slowing. Never heavy enough that I was worried, but I have not had a period like this in a couple of decades. And I have been peri-menopausal for 2 years now -- get my period very infrequently and sometimes its very light, sometimes its heavy. But I never get cramps any more. I don't get "PMS" grumpy-moody crap any more. It is never "red" any more. And it never starts in a rush like this one did any more (even when it is heavy). And it usually peters out after 3 days -- hasn't lasted 5 days in years and years.
53 2021-04-19 menstruation irregular First dose was administered on 1/22/21 (lot#EL3302) after which I began with hormonal fluctuations c... Read more
Close
First dose was administered on 1/22/21 (lot#EL3302) after which I began with hormonal fluctuations consistent with pre-menstrual symptoms (would be normal for someone 2 Yrs POST-menopausal) On 2/15/21, following my second dose on 2/12/21, I experienced the onset of what could only be described as menses, which, although extremely light, continued for 3 days. Coincidentally, on 2/19/21, I had an annual exam scheduled at which I mentioned this odd occurrence. I was advised that post menopausal bleeding is not normal and I needed follow up tests. I am relatively informed and explained that my experience was not random bleeding, it was truly a menstrual period with all symptoms relating to such, but decided to follow through with testing to be sure. I had an ultrasound performed on 2/25/21 which noted an endometrial stripe of 5mm (1mm wider than ?normal?) and a hysteroscopy was scheduled and performed on 4/9/21. Biopsies taken and visual inspection showed NO abnormalities whatsoever and my bleeding occurrence was considered idiopathic. In speaking with the physician, she refused to acknowledge that the Covid vaccine could have had anything to do with the event, but several others I know in healthcare have stated that there is a possible link and there is documentation to support.

Extreme fatigue; muscle pain 10 days after vaccine.; Abnormal postmenopausal uterine bleeding nine days after both first and second vaccine shot.; This is a spontaneous report from a contactable consumer (the patient). A 53-year-old female received the second dose of BNT162B2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 MRNA VACCINE, lot number ER8737), via an unspecified route of administration in the right arm on 08Apr2021 12:00 (at the age of 53-years-old) as a single dose for COVID-19 immunization. The patient had no medical history. Prior to the vaccination, the patient was not diagnosed with COVID-19. The patient was not pregnant at the time of vaccination. Concomitant medication included ibuprofen. The patient previously took and had allergies to metronidazole. The patient previously received the first dose of BNT162B2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 MRNA VACCINE, lot number EN6207), via an unspecified route of administration in the right arm on 18Mar2021 12:00 as a single dose for COVID-19 immunization and experienced abnormal postmenopausal uterine bleeding nine days after the dose. The patient did not receive any other vaccines within four weeks prior to the vaccination. The patient experienced abnormal postmenopausal uterine bleeding nine days after both the first and second vaccine shot, on 17Apr2021 (reported as on 16Apr2021). Extreme fatigue and muscle pain 10 days after vaccine on 18Apr2021 (also reported as 16Apr2021). No treatment was received for the events. The outcome of the events was not recovered. 53 2021-06-10 postmenopausal haemorrhage anaphylaxis; new allergic reactions to items which was never allergic to before: nuts, sea food, hai... Read more
Close
anaphylaxis; new allergic reactions to items which was never allergic to before: nuts, sea food, hair color; new allergic reactions to items which was never allergic to before: nuts, sea food, hair color; period on already menopause over one year; This is a spontaneous report from contactable reporting for herself. This 53-year-old non-pregnant female patient received the second single dose of BNT162B2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 VACCINE) on 02May2021 at 13:15 (at 53 years of age), in left arm, for immunization. The first dose of BNT162B2 vaccine was administered on an unknown date and she experienced hives. Medical history included COVID, allergy to Aspirin, ibuprofen and MIT/CIT/BIT and menopause. Concomitant medications were not reported. The patient did not receive any other vaccines within 4 weeks prior to the COVID vaccine. On 02May2021 at 14:30 the patient experienced anaphylaxis. A couple of days to weeks later, on an unspecified date in 2021, triggered several new allergic reactions to items which was never allergic to before: nuts, sea food, hair color; also triggered, after 2 weeks of the shot, period on already menopause over one year. At hospital anti-histaminic and anti-inflammatory treatment was administered. The events required Doctor or other healthcare professional office/clinic visit and Emergency room/department or urgent care. The events were reported serious as life-threatening and medically significant and had not yet resolved. Since the vaccination, the patient had not been tested for COVID-19. Information on the lot/batch number has been requested.; Sender's Comments: Based on the current available information and the plausible drug-event temporal association, a possible contributory role of the suspect product BNT162B2 to the development of events cannot be excluded. The case will be reassessed if additional information becomes available. The impact of this report on the benefit/risk profile of the Pfizer product is evaluated as part of Pfizer procedures for safety evaluation, including the review and analysis of aggregate data for adverse events. Any safety concern identified as part of this review, as well as any appropriate action in response, will be promptly notified to Regulatory Authorities, Ethics Committees and Investigators, as appropriate.,Linked Report(s) : US-PFIZER INC-2021642412 same reporter/patient/product, different dose/event.

before vaccination she has not have her menstrual cycle for quite a while, and it then started yesterday.; her periods were "heavy, flooding" with "cramps"; her periods were "heavy, flooding" with "cramps"; gums that have been bleeding easier than normal; a weird pain in her upper legs, at the "top part", which started in her left leg and radiated to the right one, last night.; Interstitial Cystitis anyway, flare it up; excessive, frequent and urgent urination; excessive, frequent and urgent urination; excessive, frequent and urgent urination; the arm where she was vaccinated was "cold to touch and sore; the arm where she was vaccinated was "cold to touch and sore; her "little finger and ring finger in both hands" were "numb and tingling", which then spread to her arms.; her "little finger and ring finger in both hands" were "numb and tingling", which then spread to her arms.; intermittent headaches; waves of nausea; This is a spontaneous report received from a contactable consumer (patient). A 53-year-old female patient received the first dose for BNT162B2 at single dose at Arm Left on 28May2021 at 17:58 for COVID-19 immuniation (53-year-old at vaccination). Relevant history included positive ANA, Interstitial Cystitis and Ocular Rosacea. Relevant concomitant drug included Doxycycline at 50 mg twice daily for ocular rosacea since 1 week before getting the vaccine to 27May2021. She noticed an increase in urination after starting it. Was told it was okay to get the vaccine while on it. Stopped it due to irritation in her stomach. No history of all previous immunization with the Pfizer vaccine considered as suspect. No additional vaccines administered on same date of the Pfizer suspect. No prior vaccinations (within 4 weeks). No family medical history relevant to AE(s). The patient explained she has experienced various side effects from the first dose. She reported having "excessive, frequent and urgent urination", which lasted for three hours the night she was vaccinated. She mentioned the arm where she was vaccinated was "cold to touch and sore." Her "little finger and ring finger in both hands" were "numb and tingling", which then spread to her arms. She then listed the following as additional symptoms: "intermittent headaches, waves of nausea, and gums that have been bleeding easier than normal". She then explained before vaccination she has not have her menstrual cycle for quite a while, and it then started since 09Jun2021 (reported as yesterday). She specified this morning, her periods were "heavy, flooding" with "cramps", which she had never experienced "at that level" before/ "more than typical". Lastly, she reported a weird pain in her upper legs since 07Jun2021, at the "top part", which started in her left leg and radiated to the right one, last night. She described this weird pain as "deep in" her legs, "not a muscular pain" but one that is either related to her "blood vessels or nerves". She said this pain is "not constant but shooting". She asked if these symptoms are normal after getting the vaccine. The patient further specified that evening she had excessive, frequent and urgent urination; she was drinking more that day, but not that much more. That same night, her left arm was cold to the touch and sore. She also woke up during the night with numb and tingling fingers on both hands; it was her little finger and ring fingers on both hands; it would start in her hand and go up her arm. She had intermittent headaches and waves of slight nausea. States that she has not had a full menstrual cycle for some time, but yesterday she started her cycle and last night it got heavier, and today it's really heavy, like it's flooding. She also has really bad cramps. Her gums have been bleeding easier as well for the past couple days, but she did not see any blood today when she brushed her teeth. Also, she has leg pain; it started in her upper left leg on the 7th, deep in a vain, almost like a nerve pain, but last night it was in her right leg; it comes in waves. The pain is in the top inside part of her legs. It's either a nerve thing or a blood vessels thing. When she was experiencing the frequent urination, she started wondering if the vaccine was all leaving her body, so now she doesn't know if she has the protection from the vaccine. Is there a way to check that? She has Interstitial Cystitis anyway, and there are a lot of things that can flare it up, but this just lasted longer. States that it lasted about 3 hours, and now she is back to her normal. While it was occurring, it was excessive, she went to the bathroom about 8-10 times an hour and her pee was clear. States she was trying to drink more water to make sure she didn't get dehydrated, but as soon as she drank, she would have to go again. She stated the intermittent headache and slight nausea, she expected to have after the vaccine. The cramping from her cycle is easing up, but the flow was really heavy earlier today, but in the last hour is has slowed a bit. On the night of 08Jun2021, her gums were really bleeding when she was brushing her teeth, and last night they were bleeding, but this morning there was no bleeding at all, so hopefully it's stopped but she won't really know until she brushes her teeth tonight. The events did not result in Emergency Room or Physician Office visit. No relevant tests performed. The outcome of event pain in leg, gums have been bleeding was resolving. The outcome of other events was resolved. The patient was due to get her 2nd dose on 10Jun2021, but she was nervous to get it. She has auto-immune concerns; she has a positive ANA. Her doctor told her that she definitely needs to get the vaccine. She had her second dose scheduled on 18Jun2021. Information on Lot/Batch number was available. Additional information has been requested

After my second shot, my period didn't come on time, but instead I had cramping and period symptoms, as well as watery discharge for over a week. Close
After receiving the first dose on 4/1/21 Lot# ER8733, I had light spotting for 2 days. Second dose given 04/23/21 and by 04/28/2021 I started bleeding again And by the second day I was soaking through pads and huge clots were coming out. This has never happened to me before. After 7 days of bleeding heavily I woke up on May 5th at 4:00 a.m. with intense abdominal cramping The only way I can describe was labor. I felt back labor, pelvic pressure, frequent urination and intense pain. I reached out to my gynecologist And he immediately told me to remove my estrogen patch and later that morning he started me on progesterone treatment for 10 days to stop the bleeding. After 7 hours of pain on May 5th, I went to the emergency department and an ultrasound revealed a blood clot. From ultrasound results "there is a complex area in the area of the cervix measuring 5.7 x 3.6 x 2.6 cm." After several hours I was released from the emergency room taking toradol for pain. That evening I passed a huge blood clot! I'm very grateful it was where it was and I could expel it. But there's no doubt the second vaccine caused this issue that has never happened to me before. I still get my periods though irregular and very light. So this event was highly unusual and very painful

The person said my reactions were normal side effects. They refused to send an ambulance because they said I sounded fine. On May 9, 2021, I started cramping. I haven't had a period in over three years. On May 13, I started spotting. This morning (May 14), I woke up bleeding.

Approximately one moth after getting my first dose of the Pfizer vaccine, I began to have a period (menstruation) for the first time in one year. The period lasted a week. As noted previously, I have not taken any medication before or after taking the vaccine, which is why I suspected that the vaccine was the cause of my sudden menstruation. I was scared of this adverse reaction, which is why I decided not to take a second shot dose of the Pfizer vaccine.

It really was like a regular nose bleed. Again, she didn't think of the vaccine. Since this is happening she is wondering if there would be a correlation. The bleeding started Tuesday and is very heavy today. It has only been 2 periods and this one was worse. The event did not require a visit to emergency room or physician office. 55 2021-01-17 vaginal haemorrhage Profuse watery vaginal bleeding 12 hrs after injection. Bleeding lasted approximately six hours. Aft... Read more
Close
Profuse watery vaginal bleeding 12 hrs after injection. Bleeding lasted approximately six hours. After first injection and vaginal bleeding, gynecology exam completed for abnormalities; This is a spontaneous report from a contactable physician (patient). A 55-year-old female patient received the first dose of BNT162B2 (Pfizer-BIONTECH Covid-19 Vaccine), intramuscular in the left arm on 22Dec2020 at 16:00 at a single dose; and the second dose via intramuscular in the left arm on 08Jan2021 at 08:00 at a single dose as COVID-19 vaccine. Medical history included a known latex allergy and previous spontaneous cerebral artery dissection x 3 ( nonspecific connective tissue disease). The patient was not pregnant at the time of vaccination and did not receive any other vaccine within 4 weeks prior to the COVID vaccine. The patient was not diagnosed with COVID-19 prior to the vaccination and was not tested for COVID-19 post vaccination. Concomitant medications (reported as other medications within two weeks of vaccination) included estrogens conjugated (PREMARIN), micronized progesterone, colecalciferol (Vitamin D), folic acid (FOLATE), and diphenhydramine hydrochloride (BENADRYL). On 23Dec2020, the patient experienced profuse watery vaginal bleeding 12 hours after the injection. The bleeding lasted approximately six hours. After the first injection and vaginal bleeding, a gynecology exam was completed for abnormalities. Previously diagnosed uterine fibroids present and some free fluid in the pelvis by ultrasound. Bleeding resolved by the end of post-vaccine day 1. After the second vaccine, heavy vaginal bleeding started 10 hours after a injection. It was reported that the adverse event result in a doctor or other healthcare professional office/clinic visit. Treatment for the event involved removal of the IUD. Outcome of the event was recovering. The case was reported as non-serious (did not result in death, was not life-threatening, did not cause/prolong hospitalization, was not disabling/incapacitating, and did not result to any congenital anomaly/birth defect). Information about the lot/batch number has been requested.; Sender's Comments: There is reasonable possibility that the event vaginal hemorrhage is related to suspect drug BNT162B2 based on a compatible temporal relation between vaccination and the onset of events. The impact of this report on the benefit/risk profile of the Pfizer product is evaluated as part of Pfizer procedures for safety evaluation, including the review and analysis of aggregate data for adverse events. Any safety concern identified as part of this review, as well as any appropriate action in response, will be promptly notified to RAs, Ethics Committees, and Investigators, as appropriate.

Close
Within 15 minutes of the injection, I developed moderate tenderness in the injection site in my right arm muscle area. I also developed at the same time moderate pain and tenderness in my right breast between my arm pit and the right side of my right breast. The breast tenderness continued from 15 minutes post injection on Monday 4-12 until Saturday 4-17, 2021. On the morning following my first injection of Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine, approximately 24 hours post injection, I developed red, itchy blotches over my face. I also developed hot, deep red itchy skin on BOTH arms, from mid upper arm continuously to the tops of my hands. Both palms were also red and itchy. BOTH kneecaps were itchy and red. BOTH feet were itchy and red on the tops and bottoms. Symptoms continued for approximately two and a half hours before dissipating. At this point I called the hospital for guidance regarding my reactions to the vaccine.

55 2021-05-03 heavy menstrual bleeding, menstrual disorder 1st shot on 3/23/21; had period on 3/28/21 (first one in five months so thought it odd since assumed... Read more
Close
1st shot on 3/23/21; had period on 3/28/21 (first one in five months so thought it odd since assumed was menopausal); 2nd shot on 4/14/21; had period on 4/21/21 (again thought was menopausal so found this very disconcerting. Also, this second period was much more heavy and lasted longer than the one previous month). I didn?t assume the periods were related to the COVID shots until I saw an article about other women reporting same. Just wanted to share this in case it turns out to be related to COVID vaccination. Will wait to see if I have another period in May, since no more shots.

55 2021-05-19 breast swelling With my first shot, my arm became sore 8-10 hours after the injection and stayed that way for about ... Read more
Close
With my first shot, my arm became sore 8-10 hours after the injection and stayed that way for about 24 hours. With my second shot (also in the left arm), I had the same reaction as the first injection; however, about 3 days later I woke up with a large lump under my left armpit. Over the next few days, I had swelling on the left-side of my left breast, swelling under the breast and below the left collarbone. This has been very painful, especially at night when I lay down. During the day, it seems to drain (relieving some of the pressure). As of today, I am 6 weeks out, and I still have some swelling on the outer left of my left breast. The lump under my arm has disappeared and the swelling under my collarbone has gone as well. Now I am dealing with sore muscles in my neck and shoulder on my left-side. I believe this to be because I could not hold my arm in a normal position for a number of weeks. My doctor ordered physical therapy for this issue.

This is a spontaneous report from a contactable consumer (patient herself). A 55-year-old female patient received second dose of bnt162b2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 mRNA VACCINE, Formulation: Solution for injection, Lot Number: EW0168, NDC number and Expiry Date are Unknown), via an unspecified route of administration, administered in Left arm deltoid on 21May2021 around 13 to 13:30 (at the age of 55-years-old) as 2ND DOSE, SINGLE for covid-19 immunisation. Medical history included chronic sinus infections, caffeine addict. The patient previously took first dose of historical vaccine, bnt162b2 (PFIZER-BIONTECH COVID-19 mRNA VACCINE, Formulation: Solution for injection, Lot Number: EW0169, NDC number and Expiry Date are Unknown) administered in Left arm deltoid on 15Apr2021 at 11:00 or 12:00 for COVID-19 immunization and experienced, doesn't have the heart fluttering anymore, excessive sleep, feels younger after her vaccine, more frequent hot flashes than she would normally feel, hasn't had a period since her shots. On an unspecified date in 1999, at the age of 33 years, the patient received historical Vaccine, Pneumovax vaccine and she had high fever, she was really sick, she thinks the nurse put the bolus really close to the bone in her Deltoid, she had a black bruise. Caller states the reason she did have that vaccine at such a young age is because she was having chronic sinus infections and the ears, nose, and throat doctor suggested she had it and it helped quite a bit. The patient also received historical vaccine, Flu Vaccine (Onset Age: yearly) on an unspecified date and states she tends to get pretty sick from a flu vaccine, so she tends to avoid them. Caller states but she did get a flu vaccine this year and she didn't seem to have too much of a side effect. Patients medical History including any illness at time of vaccination was none. Vaccines administered on same date with the Pfizer vaccine considered as suspect were none. Family Medical History Relevant to adverse events was not provided. Concomitant medication included amoxicillin (AMOXICILLIN) taken for an unspecified indication, on an unspecified date for two weeks and she heard she can get infections in the lining of her heart or whatever, but she has sinus infections frequently and she's been on antibiotics many times, so she doesn't relate antibiotics to this getting better because she's been on antibiotics for many years. Caller states time time actually, she has a dog that's on Clindamycin, but she's on Amoxicillin, which is the typical thing they give her so it's very interesting. Caller states she will see if it lasts or will come back at some point. Caller states she is definitely correlating it with her shots. The patient did not receive any other vaccinations within four weeks prior to the first administration date of the suspect vaccine. Caller states she's not sure if her side effect is adverse. Caller states she always had, she thinks its related perhaps to menopause, she always had like a flutter of her heart that she would feel nearly everyday, every other day. Caller states she would get a little tightness and she doesn't know some kind of a syncope would happen. Caller states she never had her heart checked with the doctor. Caller states since she got her shot 15Apr2021 and her second shot was delayed, she doesn't have the fluttering anymore, isn't that interesting? Caller states her second shot was delayed because a week after the first dose, she caught a sinus infection and had to have antibiotics so she got her second shot this last Friday. Caller states she wanted to call she knows this kind of information is important. Caller states everybody wants to bash companies, like the whole thing with Accutane, she said they totally helped her. Caller states there are so many disclosures, they shouldn't have taken it if they were concerned. Caller states maybe Pfizer has discovered a solution to murmurs or whatever. Caller states she feels younger after her vaccine. It was reported that she doesn't have the heart fluttering anymore and states it was just this flutter she would get, she was very conscious of it every time it happened. Caller stated, it's been going on for a couple of years, she read something that it happens to women if their estrogen drops. Caller states her menopause came late and since she's had her shots, it hasn't happened for sure because she's just so conscious every time it happens. Caller stated, prior to the second shot is when the fluttering stooped, she would say in the first week or two after the first shot. Caller stated, she thought oh my gosh it was gone, so she felt like that before her second shot. Caller states she got her first Pfizer shot on 15Apr2021, she was supposed to get her second dose the first week of May but she was on antibiotics still so she waited a few days past her antibiotics and time and for it to be convenient so she got it last Friday so she could convalesce, her dog had a dental thing. Caller stated she's gotten hot and can't tell if its a hot flash or the vaccine. Caller states she has had more frequent hot flashes than she would normally feel and she had a headache on Sunday on 23May2021 and now its gone. Caller states but that could have also been a lack of caffeine because she is a caffeine addict. Caller states she didn't have her morning coffee until really late that day, so it could be caffeine withdrawal. Caller states she drank water and then she went out to the pet store and she got a coffee and then she felt okay within the hours. Caller confirms she has recovered completely from the headache. Caller states caffeine always helps a headache. Caller states she never gets headaches, it was really weird. Caller states her cure for a headache is caffeine. Caller states she went for 10 years without drinking coffee and she rarely gets headaches. Caller stated, she felt a little bit sick on Saturday on 22May2021. So she watched movies with her dog, but that was it. Caller stated, they are saying women are getting heavier periods, it could be a hormonal effect, she imagines it will eventually come back. Caller states she has a degree. Caller states she was working and is reading a lot of science, she read tons about this whole thing and she doesn't relate it directly to the shot, it's some effect on the hormone system, maybe its not all bad. Caller stated, she was going to tell Pfizer, the first shot, the only side effect was excessive sleep. Caller states she was sleeping 12 hours the first day, the first night. Caller she slept for 14 hours the next night, and the next night it was 12 hours, the next night was 14 hours, slept again a ridiculous amount of time, 12 or 15 hours. Caller states she got it on Friday, she's a planner, she slept so deeply and it was really great. caller confirms it began at 20:00 at night the night of her vaccine 15Apr2021. Caller states she went home and she was in bed at 20:30 and didn't get up the next day until 1130, she doesn't know if she fell asleep immediately, she thinks she slept 14 hours, it was great and she loved it. Caller stated that she didn't get that much sleep on an unspecified date in May2021 with the second vaccine, she was a little disappointed. Caller stated she doesn't really consider these adverse effects, just side effects. Caller states they don't seem too negative to her, she will see if her hormones will adjust and if her fluttering comes back. Caller stated that she hasn't had a period at all since her shot too on an unspecified date in May2021. Caller states she had gotten to where she was weaning. Caller states she had regular periods until the age of 55 and she had a bunch of candied hibiscus and its known to really suppress estrogen and she sort of put herself into menopause and so she was having less frequent periods, but since she's had her shot, she hasn't had any. Caller states she doesn't know how related that is or not. Caller states she doesn't know if its ever coming back, that will be alright though. Caller she doesn't know if the weaning of it is related to the shot or not. Caller stated thanks for getting the shot out there. Caller states there has to be some special honor for these development teams. Caller states presidents have those medals and awards they can give. Caller states the scientific teams at these science companies she thinks they basically saved the world. Caller states she doesn't know, it could wipe out the globe, it's a nasty little bugger. Caller states anyway she's writing and encouraging others to do the same. Caller states she's writing the white house and her federal representatives saying and especially these developmental scientists, one of them immigrated from an # but these are teams of people that pull this off and she thinks it would be absolutely appropriate to get to the other side of this. Caller states she thinks we have a year to go, she will not be taking her mask off. Caller states they really deserve a high honor. Caller stated that honestly she did not want to take the vaccine until 9 months had gone by to see other people's side effects but because she has a science background, she knows the more the virus spreads, the more it will mutate, so she felt it was a societal obligation. Caller states she has a friend whos an emergency room doctor and they had a talk and the doctor is basically like she's got to get it, everybody's got to get it, and the caller's like okay, she's going to get it. Caller states she just thinks that she is obligated to get it or this is gonna go on and on and she thinks this virus came out of the lab, it seems very engineered to her. Caller states it's the most dangerous virus the globe has really seen. Caller stated that she hasn't had any problems. Caller states her doctor is her age and she doesn't want to expose her or her staff unnecessarily. Caller states she hasn't tried to see her in the past year and a half unless she actually has to. Caller states she's avoiding the doctor, she loves her doctor, she doesn't want her to get sick. Caller states when she did go see her, she got a COVID test and quarantined for five days before, she doesn't want to expose her to anything, she wants to make sure she's safe, she doesn't plan to see her doctor unless it's really absolutely necessary. The time of onset (24-hour clock) of adverse Events was not provided. It was reported that adverse events did not require a visit to: Emergency Room, Physician Office. There were no Investigation assessments and relevant Tests were none. The outcome of the event, headache was recovered on 23May2021 and for other events was unknown. Information on Lot/Batch number was available. Additional information has been requested.
